name: Dargah Khwaja Muinuddin Chishti
principalSajjadaNashin: Currently held by the family descendants
description: The most visited Dargah in India, Dargah Sharif Ajmer is the shrine of Hazrat Khwaja Muinuddin Chishti. It attracts millions of pilgrims annually from all faiths.

name: Dargah Hazrat Nizamuddin Auliya
address: Near Jama Masjid, Dariaganj, Delhi 110006, India
description: Located in the heart of Delhi, the Dargah of Hazrat Nizamuddin Auliya is a significant spiritual center of the Chishti Order. It is known for its beautiful architecture and spiritual atmosphere.

name: Khanqah Miran Bheek
principalSajjadaNashin: Currently held by the family descendants
address: Miran Bigha, Tekari, South Bihar, India
description: An important Khanqah in Bihar associated with the Saadat-e-Miran Bigha Tekari. It has been a center of spiritual learning and practice for centuries.

name: Khanqah Simla
principalSajjadaNashin: Currently held by the family descendants
description: A historic Khanqah in Bihar, the Khanqah at Simla has been instrumental in preserving the spiritual traditions of the Saadat-e-Simla lineage.

name: Khanqah Deora
principalSajjadaNashin: Currently held by the family descendants
description: An important spiritual center in Bihar, the Khanqah at Deora continues the traditions of the Saadat-e-Deora family and serves as a beacon of spiritual guidance.
